short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Mark website if it is outside of visit hours

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With this extension, 
- you can mark the websites where you PROCRASTINATE most
- enter your allowed time interval, for ex. each hour between 45 and 59 minutes

Websites, where you PROCRASTINATE will have RED BORDER outside of interval, but will not be marked if you are visiting in the time interval defined

Note: this extension is forked from URLColors. Thanks for author of that extension
Source code: https://github.com/nurgasemetey/VisitHours
